content: The description page of a package copy the description text from the file named package.html which should be placed in the given folder. In our example, we should document the package in the file C:\ProgJava\org\wikibooks\en\package.html.
stemmed: the descript page packag copi descript text file name package.html place given folder . In exampl , document packag file C : \progjava\org\wikibooks\en\package.html .
